summary: Plan and launch a service company offering a 24/7 AI receptionist that answers calls and books appointments for businesses.
architectural_notes: Include contact email callcraftaai@gmail.com alongside phone number in the website contact section (mailto link).

existing_features.title: Choose a single target niche that has an urgent need for 24/7 call answering + appointment booking (AI receptionist) and use that niche consistently across the website copy (headlines, benefits, examples, FAQs).
Choose a business name for the AI receptionist service and apply it consistently across the website (header/logo area, page title/meta title, footer).

Create pricing tiers and offer/package descriptions for the AI receptionist service, including at minimum: (1) a setup/onboarding component, (2) a monthly plan structure with clear differences (e.g., call volume/locations/features), and (3) an optional ongoing optimization/support add-on, and present them in a clear pricing section.

Build a simple, mobile-responsive business website for the AI receptionist service with the following sections: Hero + primary CTA, Social proof/credibility band (non-fabricated, generic phrasing allowed), Problem/solution, How it works (step-by-step), Features/benefits, Pricing, FAQ, Contact section.
Add contact information prominently on the website, including the phone number 9295019225, and provide click-to-call behavior on mobile (tel: link).

Apply a creative, coherent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) suitable for a modern B2B service website and enforce it consistently across all sections; do not use a blue-and-purple palette.

Generate and include required static images (logo and a simple hero illustration) as frontend static assets and render them in the website header/hero without routing image delivery through the backend.

Add the contact email address "callcraftaai@gmail.com" to the websiteâ€™s contact information (in the Contact section and anywhere else contact details are presented, such as the footer), and make it clickable using a mailto: link.

new_feature_requests.summary: Choose a target niche that urgently needs an AI receptionist service
Create pricing tiers for the AI receptionist + appointment booking service
Design service offers/packages (setup, monthly plans, optimization)
Build a simple business website for the AI receptionist service
Choose a name for the business
Add contact info (phone number 9295019225) to the website
Add contact email (callcraftaai@gmail.com) to the website contact section

projectName: Create marketing website for AI receptionist service (niche, name, pricing, contact)
